comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Here is article about Charles Becker from Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Becker Becker went to the electric chair in Sing Sing three years later, in 1915.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9807E4D61630E233A... 'October 30, 1912, Wednesday Charles Becker, the ex-Police Lieutenant and convicted murderer of Herman Rosenthal, who will be sentenced to death this morning by Justice Goff, in the extraordinary term of the Supreme Court, where his trial ended last Thursday night, has spent his time since then in considering the names of many lawyers as possible successors to his present counsel, Messrs. John F. McIntyre, John W. Hart, Lloyd Stryker, and George W. Whiteside.' See also www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2405655750/ and www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2423488718/
